sentences.en: A step - down transformer has a turns ratio less than 1.
sentences.cn: 降压变压器 的匝数比小于1.

sentences.en: A unit that describes the ratio of two power levels.
sentences.cn: 描述两个功率电平比值的单位.

sentences.en: After - tax profit margin is the ratio of net income to net sales.
sentences.cn: 税后利润率指净收入与净销售之比.

sentences.en: An increasing ratio of mistakes, perhaps induced by tiredness, crept into her game.
sentences.cn: 可能是由于体力不支，她在比赛中的失误越来越多。

sentences.en: As a result, a more even air - fuel ratio is maintained.
sentences.cn: 因此, 能维持合适的空气与燃料之比.

sentences.en: From the database snapshot, note the counters in Listing 3 and monitor the ratio among these counters.
sentences.cn: 在数据库快照中，注意清单 3 中的计数器并监控这些计数器之间的比例。

sentences.en: In 1978 there were 884 students at a lecturer/student ratio of 1:15.
sentences.cn: 1978年有884名学生，师生比为1比15。

sentences.en: Pruning , by removing part of the top , alters this ratio.
sentences.cn: 修剪通过剪除部分树冠而改变根冠比.

sentences.en: The adult to child ratio is 1 to 6.
sentences.cn: 成人与儿童的比例为1比6。

sentences.en: The adult to child ratio is one to six.
sentences.cn: 成人与儿童之比是1比6。

sentences.en: The isotope ratio is directly used for comparing oils or gases.
sentences.cn: 同位素比率直接用于比较各种石油或天然气.

sentences.en: The natural logarithm of this ratio is called the logarithmic decrement.
sentences.cn: 此比率自然对数称为对数的减量.

sentences.en: The ratio between the two sides is one to four.
sentences.cn: 双方人数对比是一对四.

sentences.en: The ratio could reach one in four within a year.
sentences.cn: 一年之内这个比例可以达到四分之一。

sentences.en: The ratio of pupils to teachers was 30 to 1.
sentences.cn: 学生和老师的比率是30比1.

sentences.en: These problems include the high sex ratio and the growing population aging.
sentences.cn: 例如出生人口性别比偏高、人口老龄化等.

sentences.en: What is the ratio of men to women in the department?
sentences.cn: 这个部门的男女比例是多少？

sentences.en: When using profiling it is typical to consider only the ratio (or percentage) of time spent in certain areas.
sentences.cn: 当使用分析时，它是典型的考虑时间花费在某些领域的比例（或百分比）。

sentences.en: With a decrease in the mole ratio, volatilization of sulfur decreased rapidly.
sentences.cn: 随着克分子比的降低, 硫的挥发率也急剧下降.

sentences.en: Yeah, , now you know how the sex ratio matters!
sentences.cn: 是的，现在你知道性别比例的问题了吧！ ！

words.tran_cn: 按比例的；可估价的；应纳税的（等于ratable）

phrases.tran_cn: 阻尼系数；阻尼比率；衰减率
n. 摩尔比率，摩尔浓度；克分子比，克分子比率
传动比；总齿轮比；传输比

trans.tran_en: a relationship between two amounts, represented by a pair of numbers showing how much bigger one amount is than the other
